column4: if i upgrade to dapper can i just save my home partition and mount it again?thx guys
there will be setting you want to save from /etc - but you'll need to restore them piece by piece eg. /etc/hdparm.conf

you should backup /etc & let the install reformat the /etc partition, as dapper will have its own ideas about what /etc should look like, once the upgrade is finished, any files you've modified in /etc will need to be redone
